title: Lennie seemed to get along pretty well with Candy and Crooks.
image: Lennie looks relaxed and at ease, standing in the barn with Candy and Crooks.

links_to_story.text: Lennie, Candy and Crooks talk about their dreams.
links_to_story.people: Candy was old and crippled, Crooks was black and isolated.
links_to_story.setting: The barn was a place of work and rest, but also a place of dreams and aspirations.
